Authority.name: Authority
Authority.description:
You have made yourself useful by being an expert in your field and that knowledge is valuable to the folks who work to make sure you stay alive. Without you something precious would be lost.

Ability Modifiers: +1 Con, +1 Int

Skill: Trained in Lore (pick one)

Feat: @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.W6Gl9ePmItfDHji0]{Assurance} skill feat (in your Lore skill)

Gear: @Compendium[hopefinder.equipment.UqOwULwHbtUJ61k6]{Reference Books} (10 bulk, +2 to Lore checks when you spend 1 hour referencing it)

Builder.name: Builder
Builder.description:
While everyone is focusing on surviving, you have learned how to build things using whatever parts and materials you have on hand. It might not be according to the instructions, but it works.

Ability Modifiers: +1 Str, +1 Int

Skill: Trained in Crafting

Feat: @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.QLeMH5mQgh28sa5o]{Specialty Crafting} skill feat (armor, gear, guns, structures, tools, weapons)

Gear: @Compendium[hopefinder.equipment.0GNgkcEEIchnM54I]{Tool Belt} (holds 4 tools on your belt as ready items)

Bully.name: Bully
Bully.description:
After the Fall, you quickly came to realize that the easiest way to stay alive was to take what you needed from others, usually through manipulation or threats of violence. You have a reputation to settle.

Ability Modifiers: +1 Str, +1 Cha

Skill: Trained in Intimidation

Feat: @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xQMz6eDgX75WX2ce]{Intimidating Glare} skill feat

Gear: @Compendium[hopefinder.equipment.dbVdqig4HeRGlflE]{Brass Knuckles} (weapon)

Daredevil.name: Daredevil
Daredevil.description:
You go where others fear to tread. Everything fell apart in the months after the plague and somebody has to crawl through the ruins, looking for supplies, food, and medicine.

Ability Modifiers: +1 Dex, +1 Cha

Skill: Trained in Acrobatics

Feat: @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.LQw0yIMDUJJkq1nD]{Cat Fall} skill feat

Gear: @Compendium[hopefinder.equipment.2CdamhoetlvUeRkF]{Hiking Boots} (Pass balance checks on uneven terrain)

Driver.name: Driver
Driver.description:
Most of the cars don't work anymore, but you know how to find the ones that do. Being able to travel long distances, making deliveries or picking up supplies makes your skills invaluable.

Ability Modifiers: +1 Dex, +1 Wis

Skill: Trained in Driving

Feat: @Compendium[hopefinder.feats.rrkN2kxrdsjfstvO]{Basic Maintenance} skill feat

Gear: @Compendium[hopefinder.equipment.EMwumrApcj1wb5tg]{Siphon Kit} (lets you pump liquid out of a tank)

Entertainer.name: Entertainer
Entertainer.description:
When they aren't terrified or running for their life most folks are just bored. With no radio, TV, or internet, you carved a niche by providing some simple entertainment.

Ability Modifiers: +1 Con, +1 Cha

Skill: Trained in Performance

Feat: @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xqAdXRd2gSQcqp5E]{Impressive Performance} skill feat

Gear: A @Compendium[hopefinder.equipment.bc8sOVxvNVTEl9gB]{Musical Instrument}

Fixer.name: Fixer
Fixer.description:
Everything is broken. Fortunately, you have a knack for understanding and fixing machinery. While much is beyond your reach, you can fix an engine, service a bandsaw, or get an old clock working again.

Ability Modifiers: +1 Str, +1 Wis

Skill: Trained in Machinery

Feat: @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.e4KB4pSkx2lDBNw3]{Quick Disguise} skill feat

Gear: @Compendium[hopefinder.equipment.zt0Qhn9fJxVLIKSH]{Machinery Kit} (tools to fix and service machinery)

Hacker.name: Hacker
Hacker.description:
The power might be out, but many things are still controlled by computers. Getting them juice is only half the problem and that is where you come in. You know how to get computers to do what you want.

Ability Modifiers: +1 Dex, +1 Int

Skill: Trained in Computers

Feat: @Compendium[hopefinder.feats.83mMgDCDMELC7jRI]{Bypass Security} skill feat

Gear: @Compendium[hopefinder.equipment.KLYPmqyFUSUKfoff]{Power Shunt} (supply power to a device for a limited time)

Liar.name: Liar
Liar.description:
With the right words anything can be yours, and you will say anything to survive, even if it means putting someone else in danger with bad information. Suffice it to say, you have made some enemies.

Ability Modifiers: +1 Dex, +1 Cha

Skill: Trained in Deception

Feat: @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.B6HbYsLBWb1RR6Fx]{Charming Liar} skill feat

Gear: @Compendium[hopefinder.equipment.xA2tVYzG5pno7vCX]{Makeup Kit} (lets you create basic disguises)

Medic.name: Medic
Medic.description:
There might not be a cure for the plague, but you have learned to patch up just about every other kind of basic injury or ailment. Your skills are valued above just about all others and some will go to extreme lengths to secure your help.

Ability Modifiers: +1 Con, +1 Wis

Skill: Trained in Medicine

Feat: @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wYerMk6F1RZb0Fwt]{Battle Medicine} skill feat

Gear: @Compendium[hopefinder.equipment.PHClSyVXwCmuYZRk]{First Aid Kit} (lets you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{Treat Wounds})

Muscle.name: Muscle
Muscle.description:
Turns out that being strong has a lot of uses in the apocalypse. You can open doors, scale walls, and swim through flooded spaces. It doesn't hurt that you also make a good enforcer or protector.

Ability Modifiers: +1 Str, +1 Wis

Skill: Trained in Athletics

Feat: @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.C0Tcelg3BAPhML6J]{Hefty Hauler} skill feat

Gear: @Compendium[hopefinder.equipment.kRiNuQB3PYvE08pE]{Baseball Bat} or a @Compendium[hopefinder.equipment.MYKmYue9lWgSudXx]{Hand Axe} (weapons)

Negotiator.name: Negotiator
Negotiator.description:
Nobody trusts anyone anymore, and even your closest friend can betray you. Fortunately, you have a knack for getting folks to sit down and find common ground, working together to keep the species alive.

Ability Modifiers: +1 Con, +1 Cha

Skill: Trained in Diplomacy

Feat: @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.KpFetnUqTiweypZk]{Group Impression} skill feat

Gear: Translation Dictionary (pick one language, can translate it slowly)

Runner.name: Runner
Runner.description:
You know the ins and outs of the settlement; who has the goods, who to pay off, and who to avoid. Folks come to you when they need something done inside the walls. Everyone knows you.

Ability Modifiers: +1 Dex, +1 Int

Skill: Trained in Society

Feat: @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.X2jGFfLU5qI5XVot]{Streetwise} skill feat.

Gear: @Compendium[hopefinder.equipment.gAVzqJ4tDnUU4hte]{Map (Local)} (show the main locations and streets and even a few forgotten paths)

Scrounger.name: Scrounger
Scrounger.description:
The Fall left a lot of useful gear sitting around for folks to find, but separating the good stuff from the trash is almost an art. Fortunately, it is one that you happen to be good at, and you always have something valuable to trade.

Ability Modifiers: +1 Dex, +1 Wis

Skill: Trained in Survival

Feat: @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.8qebBeOJsyRIchcu]{Forager} skill feat

Gear: Start play with 2 extra barter worth of gear.

Sneak.name: Sneak
Sneak.description:
Turns out it is a lot easier to survive the apocalypse if the zombies and the raiders don't even know that you are there. You've spent the past few years staying out of sight, laying low until this all blows over.

Ability Modifiers: +1 Dex, +1 Int

Skill: Trained in Stealth

Feat: @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.beyw5bdA5hkQbmaG]{Terrain Stalker} skill (pick ruins, rural, urban, or wilderness)

Gear: @Compendium[hopefinder.equipment.QL56tTTVuzlQCRWT]{Flashlight} and 2 @Compendium[hopefinder.equipment.xBYhPtekXHcZbOEy]{Battery (Small)}

Thief.name: Thief
Thief.description:
Listen, people are greedy, and they will horde the things that folks need to survive, bartering it for their own profit. So what if you happen to sneak in and take a few things for yourself and others. It's not like they don't have enough to spare.

Ability Modifiers: +1 Dex, +1 Cha

Skill: Trained in Thievery

Feat: @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jDdOqFmZLwE4dblQ]{Pickpocket} skill feat

Gear: @Compendium[hopefinder.equipment.l6TZHXAabM3ioaND]{Lockpicks} (allows you to open keyed locks)
